name: Your Echo I Meet in Dreams
title: Yumemizuki Mizuki: Your Echo I Meet in Dreams
in_play_description: If Yumemizuki Mizuki is the active character, you deal +1 Cryo DMG, Hydro DMG, Pyro DMG, and Electro DMG. (Includes DMG from Swirl Reactions of any element triggered by your characters. Twice per Round.)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Yumemizuki Mizuki to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
Combat Action: When your active character is Yumemizuki Mizuki, equip this card.
After Yumemizuki Mizuki equips this card, immediately use Aisa Utamakura Pilgrimage once.
If Yumemizuki Mizuki is the active character, you deal +1 Cryo DMG, Hydro DMG, Pyro DMG, and Electro DMG. (Includes DMG from Swirl Reactions of any element triggered by your characters. Twice per Round.)
(You must have Yumemizuki Mizuki in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
